descriptionHTML:
The #1 tech news app - offering the most comprehensive daily breaking news coverage from hundreds of licensed & trusted news sources worldwide.

Appy Geek delivers breaking tech news including mobile, gadgets, wearables, video games, product info, science, art, and tech culture.

“Appy Geek is my favorite technology news app” - New York Times
"A nicely designed app, full of content & easy to dive in” - Pocket-Lint

• Introducing your personal news profile! Keep track of your activities, discover your ranking, compare it with friends and followers.
• Visual: Get the latest breaking headlines from your favorite topics in a highly visual format.
• Smart: Appy Geek learns as you read, personalizing your news experience automatically.
• In the know: My News Digest is your daily news briefing built around YOU.
• Complete: We bring you complete articles with full text, photos and videos from trusted sources.
• Yours: Choose from a wide variety of tech topics for a custom home screen and news experience.
• In-depth: Explore related topics via Tag Nav™, our innovative news navigation system.
• Customizable: Add custom RSS news feeds from your favorite websites.

Featuring the best technology & tech culture publications on the planet, including TechCrunch, CNET, Engadget, The Verge, Vice and many more.

Appy Geek is available in 13 regional editions - USA, UK, Germany, Italy, France, Spain, Russia, LatAm, China, Mexico, Canada, India and International.
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

PERSONALIZE > EXPLORE > GET ALERTED > SHARE > RESEARCH > REACT
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Your Tech News - Get Appy Geek now!

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/AppyGeek
Twitter - @Appy_Geek


Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
comments: A very informative app based on your selected (favourite) tech topics/interests. Mostly I like that you can set the reading settings to night mode so that it's easy in the eyes as well as change the text size if I remember correctly. I've downloaded this app since day and on every new android device I've ever had and will have; for me this is an app worth having n' it's staying. If you're into all things tech this app is a must have :)

I like this app a lot. I am very interested in the tech sector and this is such a useful tool to keep updated! It gives you a lot of options for topics to follow for your personalized section. They have the main screen that has various topics. You can search for different topics (ex. technology) or different companies (ex. Google) or types of objects (ex. phone) or specific objects (ex. Google Pixel) or operating systems (ex. Android). Underneath the search it has breakdowns if you would like to further search your term to get more specific articles. You can save articles for later. You can "react" to articles which helps the app know what to recommend for you to read. You can adjust notification settings a lot, which I appreciate. I haven't had any issues with the app so far. Great app!

I had to change my review from 5 stars to 3 for 3 reasons. The positive side, that's my go to tech news app.. negative side, been a few months i get a notification that I can view new articles but when I open the app it's the old one and doesn't refresh to the new one. 2, it used to read the articles but doesn't anymore. 3, I contacted the developer by email but it was failed to send cause the developer's email was wrong!

All my favorite news feeds in one app! BUT, I keep getting article in different languages that I have to copy/paste into translate to be able to read. Since this app has no copy capability, I have to pull my S pen out and force it to select and copy text.

It's awesome so far and I have had it for like 3 mos. Has tons of story's and news on a variety of tech topics from lots of awesome News Sources. Have had no problems at all once I got signed in and completed my profile all the way. I had a tiny bit of trouble only the very first day I got this but that was all due to my own confused self lol. You can even use Appy Geek as your screensaver on your phone. It's awesome!  Thanks guys for the app an all your hard work on it.

Tells me everything I need to know for the tech I have. Sales, updates, changes, new products. UI is silky smooth too. Update: this app is better than ever! Can we please have an alternative to FAKEbook for commenting within the app? Thanks!
recentChanges: At Appy Geek, we believe we should provide you with all the tech and geek news you need. Some of our major updates bring you primary features that help you to keep up with thousands of tech news sources and share them with the world. Other smaller updates, like this one, may be invisible to the naked eye but they remove glitches and make news reading an enjoyable experience
Like the app? Love that update? Please support us by leaving a review!
